arcane.label: Arcane
arcane.desc: Arcane magic is the purest form of magic, concerned with the control of raw magical energy itself as well as mastering the elements of fire and ice. Wizards are the only class that gain access to arcane magic.

spells.label: Lesser Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 1 armour and 1 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Blink
spells.desc: Immediately move to any spot within range of your movement and line of sight. Can be used while Snared but not Rooted.

spells.label: Telekinesis
spells.desc: The caster can lift, with the power of their mind, a creature or object under 200KG. Enemy creatures must make an Intelligence Saving Throw or be lifted for one round.

spells.label: Summon Light
spells.desc: Summon a magical light which follows the caster for up to 1 hour. Can be dismissed byt the caster at any time.

spells.label: Arcane Missiles
spells.desc: Fires a number of missiles equal to Intelligence, each missile hitting random nearby enemies for 1d4 arcane damage.

spells.label: Burning Hands
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target in melee range, on hit deals 1d8+INT fire damage.

spells.label: Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 1 armour and 1 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Open Lock
spells.desc: Choose a target that is locked. If that target is locked by mundane means, it is immediately unlocked. If the target is locked by magical means, the lock spell is suppressed for 1 minute.

spells.label: Swap
spells.desc: The caster swaps places with another friendly character within 10m.

spells.label: Eye of Zomm
spells.desc: Summon a floating eye which the caster can 'see' through and control. Useful for scouting, however the eye is visible to others.

spells.label: Magic Sword
spells.desc: Summons a sword made of pure arcane energy that only you can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +1 modifier to attack and does 1d8+INT arcane damage.

spells.label: Summon Imp
spells.desc: Call forth a small imp who has 3d6 + caster level health, 0 armour, 1 magic reduction, 15 dodge, 1d20+4 attack with a range of 5m and does 1d6+3 fire damage.

spells.label: Detect Magic
spells.desc: The caster becomes generally aware of any magic effects within 10m.

spells.label: Frost Nova
spells.desc: All creatures within 2m of you must make an Agility Saving Throw, if they fail they take 1d8+INT ice damage and are Rooted. On success they only take half damage.

spells.label: Icebolt
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a target within 10m. On hit they take 3d8+INT Ice damage.

spells.label: Fireball
spells.desc: Choose an area 3mx3m within 10m. All characters within the area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d8+INT Fire damage. On success they take half damage.

spells.label: Invisibility
spells.desc: Your target magically vanishes from sight for 1d4+INT minutes. Only creatures with 'see invisible' will be able to see them. Performing any aggressive action with remove the invisibility.

spells.label: Flame Shield
spells.desc: Engulf an ally in protective flames, giving them 2 magic reduction. The next melee attack against that character will cause the shield to burst, dealing 1d8+INT fire damage to the attacker.

spells.label: Cancel Magic
spells.desc: Remove 1d4 magical effects on the target (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies).

spells.label: Dimensional Door
spells.desc: The caster creates a dimensional hole in a wall or door for Intelligence minutes, allowing him to pass through it temporarily. The hole can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

spells.label: Summon Elemental
spells.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has health, dodge and armour equal to the caster and does 1d8+INT damage (of the elemental type).

spells.label: Icy Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure ice that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +2 modifier to attack and does 1d10+INT ice damage.

spells.label: Summon Food
spells.desc: Conjure a selection of food. The food is enough for roughly 4 medium sized people.

spells.label: Identify
spells.desc: The caster learns the magical properties of a chosen magic item they are touching.

spells.label: Choking Cloud
spells.desc: Create a cloud of choking gas at a target location of size 3mx3m, giving all creatures within -1 to attack and suffering 1d4 damage when starting their turn within the cloud.

spells.label: Icy Grasp
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a target within 10m. On hit deals 3d4+INT ice damage and the target is Rooted.

spells.label: Mirror Image
spells.desc: Create Intelligence identical copies of yourself, confusing enemy creatures. Each enemy attacking the caster must roll 1d20, on 10 or below their attack will target a mirror image. Images die after taking any damage.

spells.label: Major Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 3 armour and 3 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Teleport
spells.desc: Instantly transports the caster to a chosen previously visited location in the world.

spells.label: Levitate
spells.desc: The caster levitates up to 1m off the ground and can move around freely for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Flaming Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure fire that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +3 modifier to attack and does 1d12+INT fire damage.

spells.label: See Invisible
spells.desc: Your target is able to see invisible creatures for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Blizzard
spells.desc: Choose a target area of size 3m x 3m within 10m, summoning a storm for up to 1 minute (requires concentration). All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 3d8+INT ice damage. On save success it does half damage.

spells.label: Chain Lightning
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a creature within 10m. On hit the creature takes 3d8+INT arcane damage. The lightning then bounces to up to 3 other enemy targets, making a spell attack on each and doing 2d8 Arcane damage. If one of the attacks misses then the chain ends.

spells.label: Blur
spells.desc: Choose a target friendly character, that character becomes a blurred image for 1 minute, causing all attacking characters to roll with disadvantage when attacking that character.

spells.label: Crystalize
spells.desc: Coat yourself in hard crystal, gaining 5 armour and 5 magic reduction at the cost of being rooted. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Group Teleport
spells.desc: The caster can transport themselves and any characters they are touching to any previously visited location.

spells.label: Enter Plane
spells.desc: The caster can transport themselves and any characters they are touching to another plane, if they are in the presence of a planar rift.

spells.label: Summon Greater Elemental
spells.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has health, dodge and armour equal to the caster and does 2d8+INT damage (of the elemental type). The elemental is also immune to damage of its type.

spells.label: Arcane Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure arcane energy that only they can wield for 1 minute. It has a +5 modifier to attack and does 2d8+INT arcane damage.

spells.label: Disintegrate
spells.desc: Create a beam of devastating energy originating at the caster and 10m in length. Each character in the line must make an AGi Saving Throw or take 4d8+INT Arcane damage.

spells.label: Call Meteor
spells.desc: Calls down a burning meteor from the sky on a target area 3mx3m. At the start of the casters next turn, any characters within the area take 5d8+INT Fire damage.

dark.label: Dark
dark.desc: The powers of death and reanimation, available to necromancers and reavers.

light.label: Light
light.desc: The holy power of Marr, available to clerics and paladins.

spells.label: Lesser Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +1 armour and +1 magic reduction against any attacks. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Lesser Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 1d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Lesser Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +1 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other Blessing spells.

spells.label: Cure Poison
spells.desc: Purge any poison from the target character.

spells.label: Weaken Evil
spells.desc: All undead or demons within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw, on failure they are weakened, forcing their next attack roll to be made with Disadvantage

spells.label: Holy Bolt
spells.desc: Make a spell attack vs a target within 10m, on hit deals 1d6+SPI damage. Deals an additional 1d6 damage against undead or demons.

spells.label: Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +2 armour and +2 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Lesser Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 1d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Calm
spells.desc: Calms a friendly target for 1 hour, they now roll with Advantage on any Saving Throws.

spells.label: Cure Disease
spells.desc: Purge any disease from the target character.

spells.label: Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 2d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Turn Undead
spells.desc: A target undead within 10m must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On save failure deals 2d8+SPI light damage and the target is stunned. On success it just deals half damage.

spells.label: Beam of Light
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a target and any targets in a line, on hit deals 2d8+SPI Light damage to each target in the line.

spells.label: Resistance
spells.desc: Pick one type of damage (physical, arcane, fire, cold, mind, light, dark or poison). That character now has Resistance to that type of damage (takes half damage).

spells.label: Greater Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 3d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Circle of Healing
spells.desc: All friendly characters within 2m are healed for 1d8+SPI health.

spells.label: Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +2 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other Blessing spells.

spells.label: Purge
spells.desc: Purge any single negative condition from the target.

spells.label: Bountiful Light
spells.desc: All allies within 5m are blessed with light for 1 hour. Any heals on them now heal for the full die amount and do not need to be rolled.

spells.label: Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 2d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Revive
spells.desc: Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. On a success the character is brought back from the dead at their previous level -1. If the character died before the last short or long rest, this cannot be used. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Greater Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +3 armour and +3 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Greater Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +3 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other 'Blessing' spells.

spells.label: Holy Word
spells.desc: All enemies within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On a failed save they take 4d8+SPI Light damage. Deals an additional 1d8 to undead or demons.

spells.label: Greater Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 3d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Resurrect
spells.desc: Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. On a success the character is brought back from the dead at their previous level -1. If the character has been dead for longer than 1 year, this cannot be used. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Angel's Fury
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a target enemy within 10m, deals 5d8+SPI light damage. Does an additional 2d8 damage to demons and undead.

spells.label: Marr's Vengeance
spells.desc: Grant divine protection to a target, the next fatal damage they would take is ignore and they can immediately make an attack against the attacking enemy.

spells.label: Spirit Guardians
spells.desc: Summon 3 protective spirits around yourself which each add 1 to your dodge. When you take damage 1 spirit is removed.

nature.label: Nature
nature.desc: The power of the nature and weather.

spells.label: Strength of the Bear
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target additional Strength equal to your Spirit for their next check or attack.

spells.label: Camouflage
spells.desc: The caster blends into the wilderness, becoming invisible for 1 hour. Only works outdoors. Making any aggressive action removes it.

spells.label: Ensnaring Roots
spells.desc: Choose an enemy within 10m, that creature must make a Strength Saving Throw or be wrapped with small roots causing 1d4+SPI Blunt damage and Snaring them. They must attempt the saving throw each turn to see if they break free.

spells.label: Call Lightning
spells.desc: Make a spell attack on a target within 10m, on hit the target suffers 1d4+SPI Fire damage and is Stunned.

spells.label: Lesser Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 1d4+SPI health

spells.label: Skin Like Wood
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 1 armour and 1 magic reduction for 1 minute.

spells.label: Eyes of the Hawk
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target Spirit attack on their next turn.

spells.label: Thorny Vines
spells.desc: Choose a target within 10m to make a Strength Saving Throw, on failure they are wrapped in vines for 3 rounds, rooting and dealing 1d4+SPI damage at the start of it's turn until they break free.

spells.label: Call Animal
spells.desc: Summon a temporary animal companion for 1 hour (Hawk, Wolf, Panther, Bear).

spells.label: Call Hurricane
spells.desc: Choose a target area 3m x 3m within range. All creatures in that range must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d8+SPI Blunt damage and be knocked down.

spells.label: Spider Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small spider for 1 hour. While in spider form the caster is considered basically invisible.

spells.label: Speed of the Cheetah
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target Agility equal to your Spirit for 1 minute.

spells.label: Skin Like Rock
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 4 armour and 4 magic reduction for 1 minute, however they are also Snared.

spells.label: Summon Wind
spells.desc: Call on the winds to help you levitate off the ground for 1 hour.

spells.label: Charm Animal
spells.desc: Choose an animal within range to make a Charisma Saving Throw. On failure animal is Charmed. The creature rolls with advantage if it is in combat.

spells.label: Bird Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small bird for 1 hour. While in bird form the caster can fly.

spells.label: Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 2d4+SPI health

spells.label: Skin Like Steel
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 6 armour and 6 magic reduction for 1 minute, however they are also snared.

spells.label: Poison Cloud
spells.desc: Summon a cloud of poison at a target area of size 3m x 3m. All characters in the area must make a Constitution Saving Throw now and at the start of their turn or take 2d8+SPI Poison damage.

spells.label: Wolf Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a large wolf for 1 hour. While in wolf form the caster gains a +3 to Strength and Agility, has Haste, and rolls 1d8+STR for melee attack damage.

spells.label: Greater Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 3d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Ankh of Reversal
spells.desc: Mark the friendly target, the next fatal damage they would take actually heals them for that amount instead.

spells.label: Tree Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a large tree for 1 hour. While in tree form the caster cannot move, but can still cast spells and gains Resistance to all damage types.

spells.label: Thunderstorm
spells.desc: Choose an area 3m x 3m within range, all creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 5d8+SPI Fire damage. On save success they take half damage.

mind.label: Mind
mind.desc: The power to alter the mind, available to Enchanters.
